/** proxy.proxyList */ SELECT paNo ,sourceUserId ,getUserName(sourceUserId) as sourceUserName ,getUserDeptName(sourceUserId) as sourceUserDeptName ,targetUserId ,getUserName(targetUserId) as targetUserName ,getUserDeptName(targetUserId) as targetUserDeptName ,DATE_FORMAT(startDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as startDate ,DATE_FORMAT(endDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as endDate ,isDelete ,regUserId ,regDate ,deleteUserId ,deleteDate ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(sysdate(), DATE) < CONVERT(endDate, DATE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS isDeleteData FROM ( SELECT row_number() over (order by paNo desc) as rnum ,paNo ,sourceUserId ,targetUserId ,startDate ,endDate ,isDelete ,regUserId ,regDate ,deleteUserId ,deleteDate FROM proxyApproval WHERE 1=1
) tmp WHERE rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

/** proxy.proxyTotalCount */ SELECT COUNT(paNo) FROM proxyApproval WHERE 1=1 AND sourceUserId = #{sourceUserId} AND ( CONVERT(#{startDate}, DATE) BETWEEN CONVERT(startDate, DATE) AND CONVERT(endDate, DATE) OR CONVERT(#{endDate}, DATE) BETWEEN CONVERT(startDate, DATE) AND CONVERT(endDate, DATE) ) AND isDelete = 'N'
